Title: Authorizes people who transport severely disabled persons as an eligible person to receive disabled person plates
Summary: Authorizes people who transport a severely disabled person as an eligible person to receive disabled person plates; defines who qualifies as eligible persons.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing persons who transport severely disabled persons to apply for disabled person plates
